meanings.definition: Apply gesso to (a surface) before painting.
meanings.sent1: She carefully gessoed the canvas before starting her artwork.
meanings.sent2: Artists often gesso the canvas to create a smooth painting surface.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally gessoed its paws while exploring the art studio.
meanings.sent4: His mind was gessoed with inspiration, ready to create a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The gessoed canvas gleamed under the bright studio lights.

meanings.sent1: The gessoed frame added a touch of elegance to the artwork.
meanings.sent2: The gessoed sculpture had a matte finish that highlighted its details.
meanings.sent3: The gessoed walls of the gallery gave a clean backdrop to the paintings.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as smooth and flawless as a gessoed surface.
meanings.sent5: The gessoed statue stood proudly in the center of the room.
